title: 3 and Out - Huge Seahawks Problems, Mishandling Zach Wilson, Gruden-Free Raiders , McVay vs. Shanahan Big Picture, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Huge Seahawks Problems, Mishandling Zach Wilson, Gruden-Free Raiders , McVay vs. Shanahan Big Picture, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Saints lackluster MNF win over the Seahawks, why he doesn't believe in Jameis Winston, and why Seattle's major problems are only going to get worse. He also looks at the trend of weak arm QB's struggling, what the Jets have done with Zach Wilson that's borderline malpractice, why Derek Carr and the Raiders are rolling without Jon Gruden, why Kyle Shanahan and Sean McVay are suddenly headed in opposite directions, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
